amendment.description: Amendment allocates $2 million to provide the Secretary of Defense the flexibility needed for technical assistance by U.S. military women to military women in other countries combating violence as a weapon of war, terrorism, human trafficking, narcotics trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
